ISSUE.TITLE: Do not seed fake customers when sample data seeding is not selected
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: **nopCommerce version:** v4.10 **Steps to reproduce the problem:** 1. Fire up a new install of nopCommerce 1. Do **not** select install sample data checkbox 1. Continue install until completion 1. Fake customers are inserted into the database unnecessarily. **Proposed Solution:** The fake users are only relied on later when seeding fake orders. I propose that installing sample customers (2 through 6 in the code) should be done in a separate method called only when installing sample data.

COMMIT.MESSAGE: #3603 Installation. Do not insert fake customers when sample data is not selected
